venue.name: Squam Lake Association at Pipers Cove

item.description:
This event open to all kayak types as well as canoes

Paddle the pristine and scenic Squam Lake launching from the

Squam Lake Association headquarters at Piper Cove, Holderness NH

The Squam Lakes Association rents canoes, kayaks to the public. The Squam Lakes offer excellent paddling opportunities with many islands, coves, reefs and miles of protected mountain views. Come explore the shores of Squam Lake.

View Photo above for view of SLA put-in at Pipers Cove on Squam Lake

Drop you boats off at the boat ramp located at the Squam Lake Association. There is a $5 launch/parking fee. Then park your car large lot next to the main building. Paddle will be approx. 8-10 miles. Squam is a large lake...so wind can create waves over the long fetch.

Life vests aka PFDs must be worn when paddling with this group

[There are many local restaurants for after paddling dining

Directions: * Take Rt I-93 North from Manchester/Conford NH * Take exit 24 for US-3/NH-25 toward Holderness/Ashland 0.2 mi * Turn right at Main St/NH-25/US-3 * Continue to follow NH-25/US-3 * Squam Lakes Association is on left

Google Maps link below will get you in the Vicinity. Look for Squam Lakes Association at Pipers Cove on the Map

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=Pipers+Cove,+Holderness,+New+Hampshire&sll=43.730918,-71.566315&sspn=0.075417,0.110893&ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=Pipers+Cove&z=14][b]Google Maps directions to Squam Lake Association and Boat Launch
item.how_to_find_us: Boat Ramp at Squam Lake Assoc. - Piper Cove
item.name: Squam Lake Paddle
